title: Douse Mou Nigerarenai
overview: Naho dreamed of becoming an ordinary office lady, but in anticipation of the fulfillment of her dream, she got a job at a design company. Her supervisor Sakisaka disliked the girl from the very beginning and treated her lightly. But then he suddenly decided to help her and even encouraged her.Based on the manga of the same name by Kazuya Kazumi.
